dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: "Hey everyone, I've noticed some strange behavior from Bob lately. He seemed really anxious during the last town meeting and kept looking over his shoulder. What do you think about it?"

dialogue.speaker: Bob
dialogue.message: "Charlie, I've been under a lot of stress lately with personal matters. I assure you, I have no intention of harming anyone in this game. Let's focus on working together to uncover the real assassin."

dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: Based on my investigation, I believe Bob is the assassin. Let's vote him out to ensure the safety of the village.
